title: Banned for something I have never taken part in nor knew existed
body:
Well I barely play league these days let alone ranked. I haven't played in a while (4 days) and today I got an email saying my account had been "banned due to the use of malicious 3rd party programs or modifications to your League of Legends client."

I get it, I get it. You've seen hundreds of posts of people saying they have been banned unfairly, as have I. The thing is, my account sucks and I don't even have a good match history, I have in no way, not even attempted to use malicious 3rd party programs. I assume this is shit like aimbots on csgo but on League of Legends, I have never even gone looking for such things and I never knew these even existed. I don't have anything installed onto my League and the only thing I have ever installed onto league was 2 years ago and it was Curse Voice. (also, that was on an old PC)

If I had done the deed, I wouldn't be here and I would accept my ban. I cannot stress enough the fact that I have never ever ever once touched any third party software. It really upsets me that I got flagged for this. I built my PC myself I know there is no such programs on here. The only League of Legends program on my machine is League of Legends itself. I have basically a perfect record except for minor chat infringement from way back, and so obviously this is honestly a surprise to me. I feel hurt that they did this to me and at the same time I have seen so much posts of people saying they got banned unfairly and never took any notice of it and just was happy it wasn't me. I never thought anything like this would happen to me.

I would say I demand proof of it, but there is no need for that because I know it didn't happen. All I ask is that a Riot mod looks into the infringement that someone placed and notice that it is completely frivolous and a ridiculous accusation against someone who has always been a loyal helpful member of the game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

if you've not yet [submitted a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support I recommend you to do so to have this issue looked into further.

Have you ever shared your account with anyone? It's possible that they may have used these third party applications without your knowledge.

Remember, account sharing is against the TOS and you take full responsibility for any wrong-doings that occur on your account.
Have you submitted a support ticket?  Probably the best way to resolve this.
